name: That Time I Reincarnated Into A Tree
name_original: That Time I Reincarnated Into A Tree
description:
Another day, another victim for truck-kun. The protagonist has reincarnated into a tree! Will he be able to survive and grow tall and strong in this cold, harsh world?

- Toss apples to fend of lumberjacks and other enemies!

- Spam the grow button with all of your might to, well, grow.

- 2 Endings! To be evil or not to be, it's up to you.

Credits:

Art:

"Modern Houses" Tileset TopDown - ritpop

Modern interiors - RPG Tileset [16X16] - Limezu

[Verboten Arcane Stash] Mini Characters - Atelier Pixerelia

Sunny Land - ansimuz

Sounds:

Free RPG Music Pack - SVL

Car crashing sound from freesoundslibrary

Update: Web version now available!

[This game is made for Mini Jam 114: Anime²]
